metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5395 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SOGo before 3.1.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sogo - 3.2.10-1build1
sogo-common - 3.2.10-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sogo package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.10-1build1').
